ygData.subject: Re: New Bard Quests! (long spoilerish)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... in ... of ... Love the suff about the armor......but did you ever ask him about the special Bardic Weapon?????? Kulanae - Bard of Kelethin Brell
ygData.messageBody:
> * You say, 'hail Walthin Fireweaver'
>
> * Walthin Fireweaver says 'Good day to you. I am Walthin Fireweaver of the
> League of Antonican Bards. My friend Cyrissa and I are here while we deal
in
> [Lambent stones] with the followers of Solusek Ro. If you are interested,
> Cyrissa and I also deal in [Lambent Armor] - the perfect armor for a Bard
of
> standing. Also, remember to ask me later about a special Bardic Weapon.


Love the suff about the armor......but did you ever ask him about the
special Bardic Weapon??????

Kulanae - Bard of Kelethin
Brell
